      • createScheduler

        protected void createScheduler(eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.SchedulerPreference sp,
                   java.lang.String concurrency,
                   java.lang.String priority)
        Create a scheduler pool with the given concurrency and priority settings.
        Parameters:
        sp - the scheduler preference constant
        concurrency - the concurrency number or ALL_CORES
        priority - the priority percent value (0..100) or IDLE, VERY_LOW, LOW, NORMAL, ABOVE_NORMAL, HIGH, VERY_HIGH, MAX
